mapper.select: SELECT CLASS.CLASS_NO, CT_NM , EP_COUNT, CLASS.CLASS_NM, CLASS_LEVEL, CLASS_MAX_PERSON, CLASS_PERSON, CLASS.MEMBER_NO, CLASS_TYPE , MEMBER_NM, NVL(open_price(#{classNo}), past_price(#{classNo})) EP_PRICE, EP_PLACE FROM CLASS JOIN CLASS_CATEGORY ON CT_NO = CATG_NO JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = CLASS.MEMBER_NO JOIN EPISODE ON CLASS.CLASS_NO = EPISODE.CLASS_NO WHERE CLASS.CLASS_NO = #{classNo} AND CLASS_ST = 2 AND EP_COUNT = #{epCount}
SELECT ROUND(AVG(RE_STAR)) REVIEW_AVG FROM REVIEW JOIN REGISTER USING(REG_NO) JOIN EPISODE USING(EP_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = ${classNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT into register values(SEQ_REG_NO.nextval, #{regNm}, #{regPhoneNo}, default, default, default, #{epNo}, #{memberNo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CLASS_WISH WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CLASS_NO = #{classNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_WISH WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT S.SNS_LINK, S.SNS_DIV FROM SNS S JOIN CLASS C USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo} ORDER BY SNS_NO

select distinct c.class_no, TEACHER_IMG, TEACHER_INTRO, MEMBER_NM FROM TEACHER T JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = T.MEMBER_NO join class c on c.member_no = m.member_no join sns s on s.member_no = m.member_no WHERE class_no = #{classNo}
select TH_IMG_NO, TH_IMG_NM, TH_IMG_LEVEL, CLASS_NO from THUMBNAIL_IMG where class_no = #{classNo}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NM, M.MEMBER_GENDER FROM CLASS C JOIN EPISODE E ON(C.CLASS_NO = E.CLASS_NO) JOIN REGISTER R ON(R.EP_NO = E.EP_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.CLASS_NO = ${classNo}

SELECT TO_CHAR(MEMBER_AGEGROUP) AS MEMBER_AGEGROUP, COUNT(*) AS MEMBER_AGECOUNT FROM( SELECT CASE WHEN AGE_GROUP < 20 THEN '10대' WHEN AGE_GROUP < 30 THEN '20대' WHEN AGE_GROUP < 40 THEN '30대' WHEN AGE_GROUP < 50 THEN '40대' ELSE '50대이상' END AS MEMBER_AGEGROUP FROM (SELECT TO_NUMBER((TO_CHAR(PAY_DT,'YYYY'))- TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(MEMBER_BIRTH,'YYYY')-1)) AGE_GROUP FROM (SELECT M.MEMBER_BIRTH, R.PAY_DT FROM CLASS C JOIN EPISODE E ON(C.CLASS_NO = E.CLASS_NO) JOIN REGISTER R ON(R.EP_NO = E.EP_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.CLASS_NO = ${classNo} ) ) ) GROUP BY MEMBER_AGEGROUP

SELECT RE_STAR, RE_CONTENT, RE_DT, RE_ST, SUBSTR(MEMBER_NM, 1, 1) MEMBER_NM, NVL(MEMBER_IMG, 'temp.png') MEMBER_IMG, MEMBER_NO, RE_NO FROM REVIEW JOIN REGISTER USING(REG_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN EPISODE USING(EP_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo} AND RE_ST = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW JOIN REGISTER USING(REG_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN EPISODE USING(EP_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo} AND RE_ST = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET RE_ST = 1 WHERE RE_NO = #{reviewNo}
UPDATE REVIEW SET RE_CONTENT = #{reviewContent}, RE_STAR = #{reviewStar} WHERE RE_NO = #{reviewNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT REG_NO FROM REGISTER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND EP_NO = #{episodeNo}
INSERT INTO REPORT VALUES(SEQ_REPORT_NO.NEXTVAL, 1, #{reportContent}, 0, #{registerNo}, SYSDATE)
